featured.text: Usually, the kilt covers the body from the waist down to just above the knees.
We supply everything, 18 waist-high tubs, shampoo, and towels.
It is a tailored garment that is wrapped around the wearer’s body at the waist starting from one side, around the front and back and across the front again to the opposite side.
Although the term did not emerge until the 18th century, toy hoops twirled around the waist, limbs, or neck can be traced back to ancient times.

definition.zh_def: 腰部，位於胸部和臀部之間的身體部分。
definition.en_def: The part of the body between the ribs and the hips.
definition.example: She wore a belt around her waist.
